Class Playlist

  • java.lang.Object
    • Playlist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilteredSongIterable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Song>, OrderedSongIterable

    public class Playlist
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, FilteredSongIterable, OrderedSongIterable
    A class that represents a playlist of songs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Playlist.PlaylistIterator
      An inner class, that represents an iterator for iterating over the songs in the playlist.
